p: Welcome to DisBot, your ultimate companion in the world of Discord! With DisBot by your side. You will experience a whole new level of convenience, efficiency, and fun.
Whether you're managing your server, engaging with your community, or simply looking for some entertainment, DisBot has got you covered.
DisBot provides 100% free service for now, and forever!
DisBot can reply for your command in up to 100ms!
DisBot allows you to setup your server be what you like!
Did you meet any problems in using DisBot? Feel free to ask in our Support Server!
Our staff team will response to your question with ❤️
Please also read our Global Chat rules.
Global Chat is a system which allows members to chat with members from other servers in the global chat channel.
You can earn more friends here
Improve your communication skills
Make your community more active
Share and express yourself more
If any user is found to have violated the rules, that user will be banned in using Global Chat.
Staff have the final say over punishment, if you think you falsely punished, open a ticket in our Support Server to appeal.
Be respectful to each other, regardless of their backgrounds, beliefs, or opinions. This includes avoiding hate speech, harassment, and discrimination.
Do not spam or advertise your own content or products. This can be disruptive and annoying to other users.
Any of the NSFW (Not Safe For Work) content are absolutely NOT allowed in Global Chat.
This includes explicit language (server name & username), images (server icon & user profile picture), or discussions.
Sharing or promoting any illegal activities or pirated content is banned in Global Chat.
Users MUST follow Discord's Terms of Service and Community Guidelines. This includes avoiding any behavior that violates their policies.
